website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight gun rack that holds as many as four guns with a storage compartment for bullets.
pros: This gun wall rack is constructed from solid wood and wood veneers
It has a timeless look that equally matches a rustic cabin or a den
The storage compartment locks fully, providing an extra safety measure for locking away ammunition
cons: The maximum amount of guns is four, and there's no space to store a handgun

customer_reviews.title: very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: First , the top weapon will not secure. The pin is lower than a buttstock will be. Which is ok with me because I don't believe in wait while I unlock this , in emergency situation. And we all know how rough this world can be at times. So I just did away with the security bar. 2cnd the wall mounting holes are on 16 inch centers, top and bottom. Very convenient. I pre drilled a little bit larger hole to keep the wood from splitting. 3rd, very easy to put together. Very nice product for the price. I'm happy
customer_reviews.author: John W. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Wood Gunrack with nice finish
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetically pleasing nice wood finish. All mounts are strong and easy to assemble. The only issue was the relief cut for the lock tongue was way to shallow. I deepened it about 3/16" with a vibratory cutter and a half moon blade. I did have to alternate guns with scopes with those that don't. With our fall seasons I needed rifle/shotgun and black powder ready and this rack saved me looking for the right one as I like to have things ready to go and sighted in on a moments notice.
customer_reviews.author: Shooter D

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: When completed and hung on the wall this gun rack looks great and does what it designed to do. Hold guns. The finish is good but the pine is soft so you have to be careful not to damage it during assembly. A few of the holes did not line up so I had to use my cordless drill to correct that problem. Be prepared to use your own screws or anchors to hang the rack. Cabela’s carries the same rack for a higher price. I had a hard time finding a three or four gun rack so the bottom line is I am very happy this American Furniture Classic 840 Gun Rack.
customer_reviews.author: WC Fields

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice rack for the money. As one other post stated the wood is a bit soft, I had to restain a couple of nicks from assembly. BIG TIP!!! Attach the hinges to the drawer bottom before you do anything else. I waited until the last steps as instructed and it was a real pain!!
customer_reviews.author: gunnnut

customer_reviews.title: I LIKE IT
customer_reviews.text: It's mounted on my wall, and holds my scoped 30.06 rifle, my Scottish sword, my antique Persian sword, a souvenir punji stake from Viet Nam, a bandoleer of 30.06 ammunition with a bipod, my police Sam Browne rig, and a bayonet. The locking wood device, which is unnecessary, does not work, and is not missed when it's discarded. Assembly instructions were written incorrectly, for the hinges must be put on FIRST, before anything else. All in all, I'm very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Mallernee

customer_reviews.title: Great price, excellent quality, fantastic company and follow through.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my step son. Excellent condition upon arrival. Had one tiny exception. They sent two of the same sides. Very disappointed. Well as soon as I contacted them with pictures of the parts they shipped a brand new unit out the day. For the quality, price and customer service I give these folks 10 stars. And would highly recommend the item and company. The unit is beautiful and functions perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: MRH

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT GIFT
customer_reviews.text: Made a great gift pretty sure it's still sitting in the box in my friends room but hey! The stand got shipped in its retail packaging no extra box so there was a label and picture for everyone to see what it is so be careful if your living with the person you get this for if it's a gift or if you got some crappy neighbors. Solid wood though deffinanly durable! Worth the money with the storage
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Pillis

customer_reviews.title: quality is good instructions not so much
customer_reviews.text: assembles easy enough designed pretty well, instructions suck and have you install hinges for the lower door after assembling (which is annoy and impossible without a right angle screwdriver (not included)) highly recommend installing the hinges onto the lower shelf before assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality poor design.
customer_reviews.text: Quality hardwood and the rack is solid when assembled. Big problem is that the support arms for each rifle stock are much too wide. The firearm does not sit erect but flops down at an angle. I had to use a coping saw and dremel set to carve out appropriately sized "U" notches in the support arms to hold the gun stock in place. Then I sanded and re-stained the wood and replaced the felt pads. As I said, great quality in materials but whoever designed the rack doesn't understand how o properly cut the arms to 'nest' a firearm.
customer_reviews.author: Mfasa

customer_reviews.title: Virtually no security
customer_reviews.text: If you are buying this particular rack to have a secure gun display, like me, look elsewhere. I’ve owned this for 2 years and can say it’s just as safe to zip tie your gun to the rack. The wooden security bar is easily pulled back enough to get the top gun off no problem. The cheap lock tumbler can be turned with a straight screwdriver. The rack itself looks decent enough. Overall, a big security risk even for Any young kids in the house.
customer_reviews.author: WMoore

customer_reviews.title: Poor instructions!  Attach the hinges early in the assembly!
customer_reviews.text: It's not a bad looking gun rack. I would've given it 4 stars but the assembly instructions suck! As many other reviews point out, the instructions tell you to attach the hinges at the end rather than the beginning. This means two of the four holes for each hinge have to be made in a very small space. Also, why weren't the hinge holes pre-drilled?
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Matthews

customer_reviews.title: MAKE A VIDEO PUTING THIS TOGETHER!!
customer_reviews.text: This does look great in our Living Roo with a Hunting theme! It was designed perfect, although the directions to pit it together is abstract and complicated, it could be bery simple if it was in Larger Font, and the drawings were larger, so that you can easily understand it.. When I finally put it all together over an hour later, I know I could do it again in 15 minutes. ENJOY!
customer_reviews.author: Chase Bandy

customer_reviews.title: Solid wood, sturdy basic gun rack - as promised
customer_reviews.text: It took me about an hour to put it together, and that's not bad as I am not a handy person. I did it while watching tv. It is decent looking, all wood (not particle board or cardboard), and once you put it together per instructions it is nice and sturdy. Just what I wanted. No unpleasant surprises.
customer_reviews.author: Back Cast

customer_reviews.title: It Took....
customer_reviews.text: awhile to put this together. The instructions were kind of vague. I had to drill different holes to get it together. I also used some felt and glue so it won't put any wear on my rifles. Once up it's a nice gun-rack.
customer_reviews.author: charles mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a place to keep my guns and ammunition organized. This holds two rifles and one shotgun. The locking drawer is great for my ammunition. There is a locking rod to hold the guns but I am not sure it is much of a deterrent to removing the guns.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Neumann

customer_reviews.title: No bad, good price.
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice but the locking bar is useless. The top section does not lock and a 10yo could easily break the wooden locking bar which is only anchored on the bottom. Its fairly sturdy and does not bend and flex at the joints. It's an overall decent deal for $60. Update: misdrilled holes on panel "B" with second sale.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper power

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Good solid rack, but the safety bar is kinda useless. Easy to construct, and fine with scoped guns or no scope guns. the left side is slightly lower then the right so your rifles have to be positioned as in the pictures, not good for having your rifle bottom side up then. The locked area is ok , but again if someone really wants the guns they can bust it open. Good rack though overall, does the job.
customer_reviews.author: M. SULLIVAN

customer_reviews.title: I took chemistry instead of shop.
customer_reviews.text: #1 We did not receive free shipping as promised. #2 The inept translation made assembly a challenge. The product materials are top notch, however. Put it this way- If you took "shop" in high school this project will be a happy one; if not, prepare for an afternoon of frustration. Oh, you will need to buy different screws for mounting on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: R.S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy construction though instructions seem complicated
customer_reviews.text: American brand but made in Vietnam...very well too. Easy construction though instructions seem complicated. Needs drill holes in hinges for door otherwise everything else done well.
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: Rifles sit very sloppy in rack.
customer_reviews.text: Rifles sit sloppy in rack. Terrible design. Rifles can fall forward or backward. Must have been a terrible product as it appeared to me and it is my opinion, that the box it came in looked like it was opened and resealed more than just a couple of times.
customer_reviews.author: DocH

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what we were looking for. Prompt delivery, exactly as described. I would highly reccomend this item to anyone looking for a nice looking piece of furniture grade quality. Hold guns and ammo with a locking cabinet for ammo storage. It also locks the guns, so you get great double protection from unauthorized users. (kids, Thieves, etc...). You can't get the guns out without unlocking the ammo storage cabinet at the bottom. I would buy from this seller again.Fast delivery as well. DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM FROM TOOL KING!!! THEY HAVE TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE AND THEY LIE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GOOD LOOKING GUNRACK!
customer_reviews.text: Pain in the ASS to assemble! The first one they sent me was not drilled correctly. KUDOS to the supplier. When I contacted them, they immediately sent me another unit. This one was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: happyjack

customer_reviews.title: Very nice gun rack, solidly built
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this rack for our son for Christmas. Overall it was pretty straight-forward to assemble, however the door hinges would've been easier to attach *before* putting on the sides. Very pleased that this rack is solid wood compared to others we looked at. Hanging hardware would've been a plus (the screws included aren't sufficient for attaching to wall). Should be around for many years, and looks great on the wall. I wouldn't hesitate to buy the rack again.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Momma

customer_reviews.title: Nice rack
customer_reviews.text: It's not the highest quality item out there. If looking for a basic display and you do not have much going on in the house, this should do. I like how it looks appearance wise.
customer_reviews.author: toddisit

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking Rack....
customer_reviews.text: Very classy rack and well made. I have mine over the fireplace. Has a storage box for ammo and shelf for my pistols..Love it!
customer_reviews.author: AmRandy Haddixazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice rack
customer_reviews.text: I both 2 of theses they look really on my wall I have both of them filled God Bless America.
customer_reviews.author: James b.

customer_reviews.title: Any body want to buy a gun rack?
customer_reviews.text: Product was completely KD..., took an more than an hour to assemble, made in Vietnam. Wood was marred with a few gouges and dings that were stained over. Screw holds did not line up but the real puzzler was that the 'back end' of the lock cabinet was completely open. Very, very cheap, not worth the little money I paid for it!
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. Valero

customer_reviews.title: Apparently not intended for rifles with scopes.
customer_reviews.text: Stylish and fairly easy to assemble. Wall mounting screws that are included are, IMO, too short. The rack and all firearms is pretty heavy and will need to mount securely. I used longer screws, into studs. I don't think this rack is intended for rifles with scopes. I have 3 different rifles with 3 different kinds of scopes and while I was able to get them all onto the rack, none of them will fit with the locking bar in place. I can store 3 pistols and a small amount of ammo in the lockable cabinet on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking light brown four gun Wall Rack
customer_reviews.text: Rack comes from Korea. It comes in a box in seven wooden parts which you assemble with easy to follow instructions It is well designed gun rack that holds four rifles and looks good
customer_reviews.author: Bill. Maybach

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased
customer_reviews.text: Well first off non of my guns sit level seems like the holsters are mis aligned, the locking device does not lock the guns at all, cant fit any scoped guns on it properly and the guns will lean forward or backward, and non of the dowels or wood plugs fit the holes. not happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Rayskat

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, does the job
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good, does the job. I have this holding a shotgun and an AR15. This will not keep a determined person from breaking the guard and stealing the rifles but it will keep the kids out. Please note that this is made in Vietnam, not America.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Go for it
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. It's good quality and pretty easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: jkvnurse

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to build, install the hinges first, the lock bar is pretty useless but it does give it a secure look. I purchased two of them and they look great on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Albright

customer_reviews.title: Not fully lockable.
customer_reviews.text: Strong and sturdy. The 8 year old helped my husband get the lock working. The rod/ stick to lock the guns in place will not stop a determined child or person from accessing the guns as the pen at the top doesn't have anything to secure the board in place it simply slides on and off. The other side of the board is secured behind the locked area and does stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Poor craftsmanship for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly made, velvet lining was coming off already, some of the pre drilled holes for the wooden dowels aren't drilled far enough so they can't be used without re drilling. Whole construction of the product seems pretty flimsy. Easy to put together though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money but not a perfect product.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome gun rack for the price. Very light, very sturdy and looks nice. Some defects in finish but that's too be expected when biting budget furniture. I'd recommend this to anyone looking to display older guns that have seen some wear. The slight defects in finish match a worn wooden stock well, like they came as a set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful gun rack.
customer_reviews.text: Husband had this put together and hung in no time. He's really pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Storey

customer_reviews.title: Happy husband...happy me!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband as a gift and he was so happy with it. Just what he was looking for in retail and couldn't find one. He had to assemble it but aside from that he was happy. Good quality, not thin wood.
customer_reviews.author: Nana244now

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR ASSAULT RIFLES W ATTACHMENTS
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping, sturdy, easy assemble, but not for assault rifles w accessories attached.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice gun rack. Bought for husband's Christmas gift. Was delivered sooner than expected. Husband really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Kaler

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the camp, just to hang the guns on to keep them from being propped up in the corner of the room. Very sturdy. I used my own screws which were drilled into the pre drilled holes on the rack. The bottom is a nice little compartment to store the bullets.
customer_reviews.author: C. Coats

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking & sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice gun rack. Directions little confusing but got it done. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: mac2

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and was easy to assemble. Instructions were good except the part for hinge installation. Mount hinges BEFORE assembly. Otherwise you will be trying to put drive screws straight down with a shelf 4" above. All in all a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: My AR fits fine with the stock extended
customer_reviews.text: Does what it supposed too. I put hinges on first as suggested in previous post and the security bar is novelty so Im not using it. My AR fits fine with the stock extended. Shelf is good place to put magazines so my bedroom doesn't look like I live at Jason Bourne's house.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed! Assembled last night and struggled through the directions, they were not too clear. Then I needed to enlarge the hole so the security bar would fit over the stud. Not worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Bob W.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Its a good gun rack, especially for the price, I wouldve given more stars if there was more space between the guns, I can only fit 1 scoped rifle on the top, the rest have to be unscoped.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great gun rack
customer_reviews.text: This rack is perfect for what I wanted, Great construction and quality wood, not your cheap substitute stuff. I would recommend for any one buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Nice gun rack, seems to be holding up very well
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the item is very nice. However, the instructions aren't the greatest, so it will take you time to assemble it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gregoire

customer_reviews.title: POS
customer_reviews.text: Put it together didn't even mount to wall yet. One of the arms that hold your firearms snapped like a twig.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Olvera Jr

customer_reviews.title: A few flaws but decent enough gun rack.
customer_reviews.text: A decent enough product for the price. There were a few scratches, notches, flaws, which I have posted pictures of. It went together quickly and holds up two rifles with scopes so far. I recommend it, but if giving for a gift as I did, open it first and check all boards.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Poth

customer_reviews.title: Discontinue This product ASAP!!
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about this product was it’s delivery time, the worst thing about this product was EVERYTHING! The biggest peace of garbage I have ever bought off of amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: nice holder but NOT theft or child proof
customer_reviews.text: looks nice, holds guns but the locking part for the guns is not secure by any means
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and good looking piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rack for my young son to place in his bedroom. Good quality at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Bordelon

customer_reviews.title: Was pretty easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my brother for Christmas. Was pretty east to assemble. I this have to peel the felt like tape and put it back down. It wasn't even on the wood in some spots. Other than that, it seems like it will hold up well!
customer_reviews.author: forg2011

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Piece was cut & glued from factory. Junk
customer_reviews.author: marsha weaver

customer_reviews.title: easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Although a little old school, easy to put together, solid and it looks great on the office wall displaying some of our long guns, we have 3 rifles with scopes and shotgun on it; we love this gun rack!
customer_reviews.author: Phil P

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, decent quality
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality, just wish the back wasn't open. The lock on the front is nice but if someone could pull the rack off the wall, everything stored in the under cabinet would fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew C. Donachie

customer_reviews.title: Arrived as stated and quite heavy.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in plenty of time for christmas seemed of good quality. I liked it but was a present for in-law and he want something different so it was returned.
customer_reviews.author: rdm

customer_reviews.title: The finish is nice and it was easy to assemble with clear directions
customer_reviews.text: Other reviewers have commented about the lack of security for the top firearm in the rack. My 310 is perfectly secured in that location as the pin goes right through the trigger guard. However my 16 and 20 gauge pumps can be slid out with the locking bar in place. The finish is nice and it was easy to assemble with clear directions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Basic gun rack
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking basic gun rack to using to display family heirloom guns. Attach the hinges to the bottom shelf first - very hard to get a screw driver on the screws once the rack is together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My husband love this, He need this for our bedroom, quick and easy to have it close, for and emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, works fairly well
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, works fairly well. Weapons will not stay put if placed upright. Best orientation is upside down. Assembly not too bad. Plan it out, though.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Michaels

customer_reviews.title: Expect extra work on assembly
customer_reviews.text: assembly not as easy as it should be. some holes were not drilled, others didn`t quite line up. Overall its an ok piece as long as you can live with a few dings and scratches
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised. Hold 4 long guns against the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Hold 4 long guns against the wall. The lock may keep out a determined 5 year old but a 6 year old should have it open quicker then a child proof bottle. That is not a slam against the rack. It hold 4 guns with a place to put a few mags and boxes of bullets.
customer_reviews.author: Shavaka

customer_reviews.title: missing parts
customer_reviews.text: had to drill holes that was not there parts for bolts were missing. but over all looks great and is stirty
customer_reviews.author: Dave L schamehorn

customer_reviews.title: better than expected
customer_reviews.text: great product and very study - fits well into my man cave - would not hesitate to order another
customer_reviews.author: Mark H

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly, Best Value, Solid Construction
customer_reviews.text: for the money this is the best “locking” gun rack I could find. It is supporting at least 50lbs of gun right now. Had it on the wall in 30mins.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Babcock

customer_reviews.title: Dresser or stand for the gun rack
customer_reviews.text: I only had a problem wit the lock bar area the didn't cut it wide enough for the bar to fit on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Abe Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a Christmas present. Hopefully it will keep all five stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a Christmas present. Hopefully it will keep all five stars
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Daughtry

customer_reviews.title: Find something else.
customer_reviews.text: A piece of crap. Where the stock and barrel sit is not curved enough, the rifles would keep rolling off the rack. I guess they knew this and decided to put the stick to hold them but it still does not work. Potential safety hazard and has nicked one of my rifles because it had fallen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Holds 4 guns well. Assembly took a little longer then expect, like another review said it would be best to assemble the hinges earlier in the process. The top gun does not lock and the locking board I had to drill the holes out a tad bit larger
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Missing a part and have been unable to return it
customer_reviews.author: cynthia metcalf

customer_reviews.title: Excellent piece!
customer_reviews.text: REAL wood, excellent quality for less than $50! Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Holds what I need it to. Didn't care for the locking bar. Kind of pointless when you can just break that off. Hangs in my closet that stays locked, I prefer easy access to my weapons and a safe wouldn't help me.
customer_reviews.author: Adam B.

customer_reviews.title: Hinges First
customer_reviews.text: if you wait until you have the rack together you wont be able to get a screw driver in between.put the hinges on the bottom board E first youll save yourself irritation and wont hafta take it back apart to get them on
customer_reviews.author: Grim

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money. It’s very secure and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Adam Peters

customer_reviews.title: It's not too bad
customer_reviews.text: Would give it a better review if I didn't have to leave all guns with scopes on them off the rack because it is not designed for rifles with scopes
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Bish

customer_reviews.title: My fiance loves this piece!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my fiance for his birthday and he loves it! It's a lovely piece and was very reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Debra McCarty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted for the bunkhouse at deer camp
customer_reviews.author: MrNorthstar

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice rack for the price. Easy assembly and install.
customer_reviews.author: #Irvine

customer_reviews.title: The locking bar is useless. Other than that it’s great
customer_reviews.text: The locking bar is useless. Other than that it’s great, I was impressed that there were predrilled holes 16 inches apart to mount it on the wall exactely the spacing of my studs
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: A+ quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Put hinges on door before assembly though. Instructions are off a little
customer_reviews.author: Joseph R. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Cheap wood.
customer_reviews.text: Went together easy enough and looked nice, but when I picked it up to mount it on the wall one of the racks split off. Its may have just been bad luck but it more likely the super cheap wood. Would not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph R Leedy

customer_reviews.title: Cherry finish gibves it a rich look!
customer_reviews.text: Looks gorgeous on our wall holding our guns. It is the first compliment we get from our guest when people come over. It hangs in our library room. Although, it had to be rigged with heavy duty support underneath we got at the hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lock does not work .
customer_reviews.text: Nice finish , it holds the rifle's but the lock does not work . More than likely you will need to buy a different lock at Lowe's or another hardware store .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended item!
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and easy to assemble. Wood quality and finish is better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is nice and sturdy . Very pleased with it. It was easy to build
customer_reviews.author: liljeno4

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality requiring major assembly
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality requiring major assembly. Not USA made as suggested in description but made in Vietnam. There is no viable secure locking mechanism and overall finish was more for a basement display than living quarters.
customer_reviews.author: JVP

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble. Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Not big on the locking aspect as it would be easy to break to get the guns off the wall but not using it for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking final product, took half hour to assemble. Easy!!!! Quality!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not very functional!
customer_reviews.text: Kinda hard to get guns in or out because of the bar that run vertivpcally up the left side. It is pretty but not very functional if you want to use it to hold guns you use on a regular basis, would be great for displaying rare, or collectable guns.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Condie

customer_reviews.title: Nice gun rack
customer_reviews.text: Is exactly what i expected and works for its purpose
customer_reviews.author: Nikki L. Rohde

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!!
customer_reviews.text: The gun rack was just what I expected. Easy to put together and it looks great. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Sorrell

customer_reviews.title: great gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband, was an easy assembly even for me. Clear directions, Solid wood, great buy. The safety bar is kinda pointless. Are still able to get the guns out but good for holding them on the shelf incase bumped. Locked drawer is not the best but still works. Glad I went with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Williams

customer_reviews.title: Very nice gun rack
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice way to store store guns and have them ready for use. I'm sure the person it was purchased as a gift for will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lizabeth Osterholt

customer_reviews.title: It is very nice but the locking bar was not so good
customer_reviews.text: It is very nice but the locking bar was not so good. It didn't really lock and there wasn't anything to hold the top of it to the pin, That needs rethinking!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Tenn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little gun case...easy to assemble and it looks great in the office.
customer_reviews.author: lambert9683

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Product came on time
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Product came on time. I am only giving it 4 stars because the assembly didn't go as well as I had hoped. The saw doesn't sit flush against the unit, but does stay closed when locked, so it's not a functional issue, just annoys me. Also could be my error because some of the holes were not drilled so you had to figure out where they went to line up. Overall though, I am very happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Nice product! Only thing I didn't care for is ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice product! Only thing I didn't care for is the locking system it would of been so simple to go one more step to make it lock securely instead of being flimsy . I'm in process of making my own locking system for it , once done I'll post pic and others may wanna try it
customer_reviews.author: tyson barlow

customer_reviews.title: It was extremely hard to get the screws to the ...
customer_reviews.text: It was extremely hard to get the screws to the hinges in eithout stripping them. Plus, it does not come with mounting bolts or any suggestion of what to buy to mount this on your wall
customer_reviews.author: Toucan Shan
